name: security-group-ip-poker
description: A simple Lambda function to 'poke' a hole in an AWS security group for temporary access from an authorised IP.
author: Tim Malone <tdmalone@gmail.com>

scripts.execute: docker run --rm -e CI -e LOCAL_TIMEZONE -e AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID -e AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY -e AWS_DEFAULT_REGION -e AWS_SECURITY_GROUP_ID -e AWS_SECURITY_GROUP_PORTS -v $PWD:/var/task lambci/lambda:nodejs6.10 index.handler "$(cat tests/fixtures/api-gateway-request.json)"
